author: Richard Maclin and David W. Opitz
title: An Empirical Evaluation of Bagging and Boosting
window: that can be drawn from the results is that both the Simple Ensemble and Bagging approaches almost always produces better performance than just training a single classifier. For some of these data sets (e.g., glass kr-vs-kp, letter, segmentation, soybean, and vehicle) the gains in performance are quite significant.
